# Services

Use me when you need:

## Venture design

Go-to-market scenarios; productised ideas; operationalised initiatives; product-market analysis; pricing strategies and modelling; subsequent proposals, pitches, collateral, and websites.

## Technology design

Solution as product; lean web solutions; prototypes; human-computer interaction; UX/UI design; appropriate technology decisions.

## Learning design

Programme-market analysis; curriculum design; authentic experiential assessments for learning; workshop design and delivery; online learning design; face-to-face teaching and learning.
